articles.author: Charles Bradley
articles.title: Gil de Ferran obituary: Indy 500 winner and two-time IndyCar champion dies aged 56 - Autosport
articles.description: When Gil de Ferran sealed victory in his final attempt at the Indianapolis 500 in 2003, it crowned a career that epitomised his remarkable battling nature and great racing acumen.
articles.content: De Ferran, who has died aged 56, beat his great friend, and fellow Brazilian Team Penske team-mate, Helio Castroneves by 0.299s after a fierce battle for honours in Americas biggest open-wheel race.… [+4727 chars]
